import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BackendService } from 'src/app/services/backend.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-orders', templateUrl: './orders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.css'] }) export class OrdersComponent implements OnInit{ orders = []; constructor(private service:BackendService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getOrder('63f55da13a3e6df039d8abb1').subscribe((data)=>{ this.orders = data }); } }
